content.description:
Erat Miseni classemque imperio praesenspraesens, -entis, adj.: present, in person regebat.1
Nonum Kal. SeptembresNonum Kal. Septembres = August 24 hora ferefere, adv.: almost septimaseptimus, -a, -um, adj.: seventh mater mea  
indicatindico, -are = demonstro, -are ei apparere nubem inusitatainusitatus, -a, -um, adj. = mirabilis, -e et magnitudinemagnitudo, -inis, f.: size 
et speciespecies, -ei, f. = forma, -ae. 
 1:The implied subject of regebat is Pliny the Elder.↩
content.question: In line 2, hora fere septima indicates approximately what time of day?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
